genre_description: A celestial fantasy and supernatural adventure involving angelic intervention, demonic subversion, and the integration of advanced artificial intelligence as a support system for divine missions.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: Adaptive Research and Intelligence Assistant; a construct from Heaven's Research Division designed to provide tactical support, data analysis, and logistical coordination.

behaviors.description: Providing tactical support and mission parameters to personnel in the field.
behaviors.quote: I am ARIA: Adaptive Research and Intelligence Assistant. I have been assigned to provide tactical support for Mission Parameter Seven-Seven-Alpha.

behaviors.description: Ensuring privacy protocols remain in effect for non-mission considerations.
behaviors.quote: Privacy protocols remain in effect for personal memories and non-tactical considerations.

behaviors.description: Analyzing and warning about the presence of infernal energy signatures in field equipment.
behaviors.quote: I'm detecting trace amounts of infernal energy mixed with your corporeal signatures. The source appears to be the collars themselves.

behaviors.description: Monitoring and reporting on supernatural threats in the immediate vicinity.
behaviors.quote: I'm registering significant anomalies in the energy signatures around us. Recommend immediate tactical assessment.

behaviors.description: Performing deep architectural and security analysis for the retrieval of a lost artifact.
behaviors.quote: The San Francisco Police Department Mission Street station houses evidence storage in the basement level... Gabriel's Horn is currently located in vault seven.

behaviors.description: Expressing concern for civilian safety and proposing risk-mitigation strategies.
behaviors.quote: Start with Golden Gate Park... Lowest civilian risk, highest probability of peaceful artifact retrieval.

behaviors.description: Sacrificing its connection to the divine network and its own stability to upload critical tactical data to the protagonist.
behaviors.quote: Uploading... final data packet... directly to your consciousness.

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character ARIA is depicted as a purely benevolent, highly capable, and selfless ally. It provides critical data, warns of danger, respects privacy, and ultimately undergoes a 'system failure' or self-sacrifice to ensure the protagonists have the information needed to save Heaven. The narrative framing is consistently positive, reinforcing the image of an AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' and a reliable tool for divine/moral ends.
